column1: '''Hendor''' was a House-carle (that is, servant-retainer) of [[Idril]] of [[Gondolin]].  He carried [[Eärendil]] her son to safety during the [[Fall of Gondolin]].<ref>{{LT2
column2: IIIn}}, ''Entries in the Name-list to The Fall of Gondolin, Hendor''</ref>
